title: JPMorgan's Dimon Says Up to Board on How Long He Stays CEO
description: JPMorgan Chase Chair and CEO Jamie Dimon says he wants to remain the company's CEO during an interview with David Rubenstein at the US Chamber of Commerce's 2026 State of American Business. (Source: Bloomberg)
